tred_extension.title: Create a file-list by filtering text file columns
tred_extension.description: Add a function Macros->TredMacro->File-list Filter (F10) that can be used to create a file list by filtering an input text file (e.g. a PML-TQ query result) consisting of one or more TAB-separated columns the last of which is a filename, URL, or a node address. The selection is then based on the values in the other columns.
